attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a bank holiday!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Personally I think England doesn't celebrate St Georges day enough, so lets start by making it a BANK HOLIDAY. Everyone else gets there's a bank holiday so why do the English have to suffer?

We should be entitled to have our day to celebrate our beloved England, get happy, proudly put up our flag and sing God Save The Queen!

I think it should become a HUGE event! All cities and towns should celebrate.

England have alot to be proud of, so why don't we show it! Give us our bank holiday so we can truly appreciate St George. 


Winston Churchill wrote:
"There is a forgotten, nay almost forbidden word,
which means more to me than any other.
That word is ENGLAND."

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
